Reviews.Title: Good lens for most applications.
Reviews.Author: macsareback
Reviews.Content: This is a better small sensor lens for this camera, the P10 isn't bad on a budget, but this is sharper overall. I think that the sensor could have been a bit bigger, but that's why they made the A12. If you can't afford the A12, grab this. The P10 is good for other applications but not low light.

Reviews.Title: Perfect lens for GXR! Great!!
Reviews.Author: S. BAIK
Reviews.Content: I bought this lens with GXR unit. took some shots inside and outside. That picture quality is awsome!! Very impressive it is.

ProductInfo.Features:
Camera unit features a 10-megapixel, 1/1.7-inch CCD sensor; Smooth Imaging Engine IV processing engine
24-72mm high-performance 3x wide-angle zoom lens
7-group, 11-element configuration (aspherical lens: 4 elements, 4 surfaces)
Camera shake correction function (image-sensor-shift type) reduces hand-motion blur
Compatible with the Ricoh GXR interchangeable unit camera system
ProductInfo.Name: Ricoh S10 24-72mm f/2.5-4.4 VC Ricoh LENS with 10MP CCD Sensor
